questions.question: What is a traditional Japanese greeting?
How do you express gratitude in Japanese?
What is the meaning of the Japanese word 'Kanpai'?
How is money commonly exchanged in Japan?
options: Directly passing it hand to hand

questions.questions: What is considered impolite in Japan regarding dining?
options: Eating While walking on the street
questions.correct_option: Eating While walking on the street

questions.question: What is the traditional Japanese way of greeting someone at a home?
options: Taking off shoes at the entrance
questions.correct_option: Taking off shoes at the entrance

questions.question: What is the customary way to offer and receive business cards in Japan?
options: Receive with both hands, read it carefully, and put it in your pocket
Fold it before handing it over
questions.correct_option: Receive with both hands, read it carefully, and put it in your pocket

questions.question: What does the Japanese phrase 'Ganbatte kudasai' mean?
What should you avoid doing when giving gifts in Japan?
options: Opening the gift immediately upon receiving it
Wrapping the gift in colorful paper
questions.correct_option: Opening the gift immediately upon receiving it
